entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
